title: hextech chest bug?
body: So, i tried to open a hextech chest and the  client froze and i had to log out and log back in. I came back, and the key and chest were gone and i did not receive any loot. i read that this happens a lot and i should just wait but it has been around 2 hours and still nothing.

replies.body: Look my problem i get a chest with champion because i earned s and i get a ches but i cant open it says 0/1 chest but ches is availabe .

It looks like you actually got a Murk Wolf Icon from that chest. They can be a little confusing since they never go into your loot page. Icons are automatically redeemed, so you should be able to find your new Summoner Icon in your profile ^_^!
oh, didnt even notice that thank you !
